original_text: Abijah went out to battle, having an army of valiant men of war, 400,000 chosen men. And Jeroboam drew up his line of battle against him with 800,000 chosen mighty warriors.
korean_text: 아비야는 싸움에 용감한 군사 사십만 명을 택하여 싸움을 준비하였고 여로보암은 큰 용사 팔십만 명을 택하여 그와 대진한지라

sentences.original_text: having an army of valiant men of war
And Jeroboam drew up his line of battle against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여로보암이 그를 맞아 진을 쳤습니다
